verses.padam: (Padam) prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|akAmayata|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|sRujEya|iti|saḥ|tapa̍ḥ|atapyata|saḥ|sarpAn|asRujata|saḥ|akAmayata|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|sRujEya|iti|saḥ|dvitIya̱m|atapyata|saḥ|vayAṃ̍si|asRujata|saḥ|akAmayata|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|sRujEya|iti|saḥ|tRutIya̱m|atapyata|saḥ|Etam|dIkṣitavAdamiti̍# dIkṣita - vAdam|apaśyat|tam|avadat|tataḥ|vai|saḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|asRujata|yat|tapaḥ|taptvA|dIkṣitavAdamiti̍# dIkṣita - vAdam|vadati|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatirakAmayata̍ prajAḥ sRujEyEti̍ sa tapO&tapyata̍ sa sarpAnasRujata̍ sO&kAmayata̍ prajAḥ sRujEyEti̍ sadvitIyamatapyata̍ sa vayAṅsya̍ sRujata sO&kAmayata̍ prajAḥ sRujEyEti̍ sa tRutIyamatapyata̍ sa EtaM dI̱kṣitavAda-mapaśyat̍ tamavadat̍ tatO vai sa prajA asRujata̍ yat tapastaptvA̍ dI̱kṣitavAdaM ~Mvadati̍ prajA Eva tadyajamAnaḥ̍ - [ ] 1

verses.padam: (Padam) sRujatE|yat|vai|dIkṣitaḥ|amEddhyam|paśyati|apEti̍|asmAt|dIkṣA|krAmati|nIla̱m|asya|hara̍ḥ|vIti̍|Eti|aba̍ddham|mana̍ḥ|daridra̱m|cakṣu̍ḥ|sUrya̍ḥ|jyOti̍ṣAm|śrEṣṭha̍ḥ|dIkṣE̱|mA|mA|hAsIḥ|iti̍|Aha|na|asmAt|dIkṣA|apEti̍|krAmati|na|asya|nIla̱m|na|hara̍ḥ|vIti̍|Eti|yat|vai|dIkṣitam|aBivaṛṣatItya̍Bi-vaṛṣa̍ti|divyAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|aśA̱ntAḥ|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|dIkṣAm|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sRujatE yadvai dI̱kṣitO&mEddhyaM̍ paśyatyapA̱smAddIkṣAkrAmati̍ nIlamasya̍ harO vyE̱tyabaddhaM̍ manO# daridraM cakṣuḥ sUryO jyOtiṣAṅqśrEṣṭhO̍ dIkṣE mA mAhAsIrityA̍ha̍ nAsmA̱ddIkṣA&pakrAmati̍ nAsya nIlaM na harO vyEti̍ yadvai dI̱kṣitamaBivaṛṣa̍tidivyA̍ ApO&śA̱ntA OjO balaM̍ dIkṣAM - [ ] 2

verses.padam: (Padam) tapaḥ|asya|niriti̍|Gnanti|undatIḥ|bala̱m|dhatta|Oja̍ḥ|dhatta|bala̱m|dhatta|mA|mE|dIkṣAm|mA|tapa̍ḥ|niriti̍|vadhiṣṭa|iti̍|Aha|Etat|Eva|sarva̱m|Atmann|dhattE|na|asya|Oja̍ḥ|bala̱m|na|dIkṣAm|na|tapa̍ḥ|niriti̍|Gnanti|agniḥ|vai|dIkṣitasya̍|dEvatA̱|saḥ|asmAt|Etaṛhi̍|tiraḥ|iva|yaṛhi̍|yAti̍|tam|Iśvaram|rakṣAṃ̍si|hantO̱ḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tapO̱&syanirGnantyundatIr̍ balaM̍ dhattaujO# dhatta balaM̍ dhatta mA mE# dIkṣAM mA tapOnirvadhiṣṭEtyA̍hai̍ tadEva sarvamAtman̍ dhattE̍ nAsyaujO balaM na dIkṣAM na tapOnirGnantyagnirvai̍ dI̱kṣitasya# dEvatA sO̱&smAdEtaṛhitira̍ iva̍ yaṛhi yAti tamI̱śvaraṃ rakṣAṃsi̍ hantO̱ - [ ] 3

verses.padam: (Padam) BadrAt|aBIti|śrEya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ihi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|pura̍ EtEti# puraḥ - EtA|tE|astu|iti|Aha|brahma̍|vai|dEvAnA̱m|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tam|Eva|anvAra̍Bata̍ ityanu̍ - AraBatE|saḥ|Enam|samiti̍|pArayati|Eti̍|idam|aganma|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|pRuthivyAḥ|iti̍|Aha|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|hi|Eṣaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|AgacCatItyA̱̍ - gacCati|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|yat|aju̍ṣanta|pUrvE̱|iti̍|Aha|viśvE̱|hi|Etat|dEvAḥ|jOṣaya̍ntE|yat|brAhmaṇAḥ̍ ( )|RuKsAmAByAmityRuKsAmA̍ -ByAm|yajuṣA|santara̍nta̍ iti# saM - tarantaḥ|iti̍|Aha|RuKsAmAByAmityRu̍KsAmA̍ - ByAm|hi|Eṣaḥ|yajuṣA|santaratIti̍# saM - tarati|yaḥ|yaja̍tE|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|iṣA|madEma|iti̍|Aha|AśiṣamityA̱̍ - śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti|śAstE||4̍ (74) (yajamAnO̍ - dIkṣAṃ - hantO̱ - rbrAhmaṇA -ścaturviṃśatiśca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: rBadrAdaBiśrEyaḥ prEhibRuhaspatiḥ̍ pura EtA tE# astvityAhabrahma̍ vai dEvAnAM bRuhaspatistamEvAnvA raBatE̍ sa Enaṃq̍ saM pArayatyE̍ damaganma̍ dEvayajanaM̍ pRuthivyA ityAha̍ dEvayajanaṅq̍ hyEṣa̍ pRuthivyA̍ AgacCati̍ yO yajatE̍ viśvE# dEvA yadajuṣanta̍ pUrva ityAha̍ viśvE hyEtaddEvA̍ jOṣayantE̍ yadbrA̱hmaṇA ( ) RuKsAmAByAM̍ ~MyajuṣA̍ santaranta̍ ityAharKsAmAByAṅq̍ hyEṣa̍ yajuṣA̍ santarati̍ yO yajatE̍ rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ samiṣA-madEmEtyA̍-hA&śiṣa̍mEvai̍ tAmA śA̱stE||4 (yajamAnO̍ - dIkṣAṃ - hantO̱ - rbrAhmaṇA -ścaturviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) Eṣaḥ|tE|gAyatraḥ|BAgaḥ|iti|mE|sOmA̍ya|brUtAt|Eṣaḥ|tE|traiṣṭu̍Baḥ|jAga̍taḥ|BAgaḥ|iti̍|mE|sOmA̍ya|brUtAt|CandOmAnAmiti̍# Candaḥ - mAnA̱m|sAmrA̱jyamiti sAm - rAjyam|gacCa|iti|mE|sOmA̍ya|brUtAt|yaḥ|vai|sOma̱m|rAjA̍nam|sAmrA̱jyamiti̍ sAm - rAjyam|lOkam|gamayitvA|krIṇAti|gacCa̍ti|svAnA̱m|sAmrA̱jyamiti̍ sAm - rAjyam|CandAṃsi|Kalu̍|vai|sOma̍sya|rAjña̍ḥ|sAmrA̱jya̍ iti sAm - rAjyaḥ|lOkaḥ|purastA̱t|sOmasya|krayAt|Evam|aBIti̍|mantrayEta|sAmrA̱jyamiti̍ sAm - rAjyam|Eva|5 (50)
verses.samhita: Eṣa tE# gAyatrO BAga iti# mE sOmAya̍ brUtAdEṣa tE traiṣṭuBO̍ jAgatO̍ BAga iti# mE sOmAya̍ brUtAcCandOmAnAṃq sAmrA̱jyaM gacCEti# mE sOmAya̍ brUtAd yO vai sOmaṃq rAjAnaṃq̍ sAmrA̱jyaM ~MlOkaM gamayitvA̍ krIṇAti gacCati̍ svAnAṃq sAmrA̱jyaM CandAṃsi̍ Kalu vai sOmasya̍ rAjñaḥ sAmrA̱jyO lOkaḥ purastAth sOmasya̍ krayAdEvamaBi mantrayEta̍ sAmrA̱jyamEvai - [ ] 5

verses.padam: (Padam) Enam|lOkam|gamayitvA|krIṇAti|gacCati|svAnA̱m|sAmrA̱jyamiti̍ sAm - rAjyam|yaḥ|vai|tAnUnaptrasyEti# tAnU - naptrasya|pratiṣṭhAmiti̍# prati - sthAm|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|na|prAśnantIti̍# pra - aśnanti|na|juhvati|atha̍|kva̍|tAnUnaptramiti̍# tAnU - naptram|pratIti|tiṣṭhati|iti̍|prajApa̍tAviti̍# prajA-patau|manasi|iti̍|brUyAt|triḥ|avEti̍|jiGrEt|prajApa̍tAviti̍# prajA - patau|tvA|manasi|juhOmi|iti̍|EṣA|vai|tAnUnaptrasyEti̍# tAnU - naptrasya|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yaḥ|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: naM̍ ~MlOkaM gamayitvA̍ krIṇAti̍ gacCati̍ svAnAṃq sAmrA̱jyaM ~MyO vai tAnUnaptrasya̍# pratiṣṭhAM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti na prAśnanti na juhvatyatha̍ kva# tAnUnaptraM prati# tiṣṭhatIti# prajApatau̍ manasIti# brUyAt trirava# jiGrEt prajApatau̍ tvA manasi̍ juhOmItyEṣA vai tAnUnaptrasya̍# pratiṣṭhA ya EvaM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yO - [ ] 6

verses.padam: (Padam) vai|addhvaryOḥ|pratiṣṭhAmiti# prati - sthAm|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yata̍ḥ|manyE̍ta|ana̍BikramyEtyana̍Bi̍ - kramya|hOṣyAmi|iti|tat|tiṣṭhann̍|Eti̍|śrAvayEt|EṣA|vai|addhvaryOḥ|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|pratIti̍|Eva|tiṣṭhati|yat|aBikramyEtya̍Bi̍ - kramya|juhuyAt|pratiṣṭhAyA̍ iti# prati-sthAyA̱ḥ|iyAt|tasmA̱t|samAnatra|tiṣṭha̍tA|hOtavya̱m|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|yaḥ|vai|addhvaryOḥ|svam|vEda|svavAniti̍ sva - vAn|Eva|Bavati|sruk|vai|asya|svam|vAyavya̱m|asya|7 (50)
verses.samhita: vA addhvaryOḥ̍ pratiṣṭhAM̍ ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yatO manyEtAnaBikramya̍ hOṣyAmIti tat tiṣṭhannA śrAvayEdEṣA̍ vA addhvaryOḥ̍ pratiṣṭhA̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda pratyEva tiṣṭhati̍ yadaBikramya̍# juhuyAt pratiṣṭhAyA̍# iyAt tasmA̱th samAnatra tiṣṭhatA̍ hOtavyaM̍ pratiṣṭhityai̍ yO vA addhvaryOḥ̍ svaM ~MvEda svavAnEva̍ Bavati̍ srugvA asya̍ svaM ~MvAyavya̍masya̍ - [ ] 7

verses.padam: (Padam) svam|camasaḥ|asya|svam|yat|vAyavya̱m|vA|camasam|vA|ananvAraByEtyana̍nu̍ - AraBya|AśrAvayEdityA̱ - śrAvayE̱t|svAt|iyAt|tasmA̱t|anvAraByEtyanu̍ - AraBya|AśrAvyamityA̱̍ - śrAvya̱m|svAt|Eva|na|Eti|yaḥ|vai|sOma̱m|apratiṣṭhApyEtyapra̍ti̍ - sthApya|stOtram|upAkarOtItyupa̍ - AkarOti|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|sOmaḥ|Bava̍ti|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|stOmaḥ|apra̍tiṣṭhitAnItyapra̍ti̍ - sthitAni|ukthAni|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|yajamAnaḥ|apra̍tiṣṭhita̍ ityaprati̍ - sthitaḥ|adhvaryuḥ|vAyavya̱m|vai|sOmasya|pratiṣṭhEti̍# prati - sthA|camasaḥ|asya|pratiṣṭhEti# prati - sthA|sOmaḥ|stOma̍sya|stOma̍ḥ|ukthAnA̱m|graha̱m|vA̍ ( )|gRuhItvA|camasam|vA|unnIyEtyut̍ - nIya|stOtram|upAku̍ryAdityu̍pa̍ - AkuryAt|pratIti̍|Eva|sOma̱m|sthApaya̍ti|pratIti̍|stOma̱m|pratIti̍|ukthAni̍|pratIti̍|yaja̍mAnaḥ|tiṣṭha̍ti|pratIti̍|addhvaryuḥ||8̍ (69) (Eva - tiṣṭhati̍ yO - vAyavya̍masya̍ - grahaM ~Mvai - kAnna - viṃśatiśca̍)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: svaM camasO̱&sya̍ svaM ~MyadvAyavya̍M̍ ~MvA camasaM ~MvA&nanvAraByA&&śrAvayEth̍ svAdiyAt̍ tasmA# danvAraByA &&śrAvyaṅq svAdEva naiti yO vai sOmama- pratiṣṭhApya̍ stOtra-mupAkarOtya̍ pratiṣṭhitaḥ̍ sOmO Bavatyapratiṣṭhitaḥ̍ stOmO- &pratiṣṭhitA-nyukthAnyapra̍tiṣṭhitO̍ yajamAnO̍ &pratiṣṭhitO̍ &dhvaryurvA# yavyaM̍ ~Mvai sOmasya̍ pratiṣṭhA camasO̱&sya̍ pratiṣṭhA sOmaḥ stOmasya̍ stOma# ukthAnAM grahaM̍ ~MvA ( ) gRuhItvA camasaM̍ ~MvOnnIya# stOtramupA kuryAt̍ pratyEva sOmaṅ# sthApayati̍ pratistOmaM pratyukthAni prati yajamAnastiṣṭha̍ti̍ pratyaddhvaryuḥ||8̍ (Eva - tiṣṭhati̍ yO - vAyavya̍masya̍ - grahaM ~Mvai - kAnna - viṃśatiśca̍)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) yajñam|vai|Etat|samiti|Baranti|yat|sOmakraya̍ṇyA̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇyai|padam|yajñamuKamiti̍# yajña - muKam|havid^^rdhAnE iti# haviḥ - dhAnE̱|yaṛhi|havid^^rdhAnE̍ iti# haviḥ - dhAnE̱|prAcI iti|pravartayE̍yuriti̍# pra - vartayEyuḥ|taṛhi̍|tEna̍|akṣa̱m|upEti̍|a~jjyAt|yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajña-muKE|Eva|yajñam|anu|samiti̍|tanOti|prA~jca̱m|agnim|prEti̍|haranti|uditi̍|patnI̱m|Eti̍|nayanti|anviti̍|anAṃ̍si|prEti̍|vartayanti|atha̍|vai|asya|Eṣaḥ|dhiṣṇi̍yaḥ|hIyatE|saḥ|anviti̍|dhyAyati|saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|rudraḥ|BUtvA|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñaM ~MvA Etath saM Baranti̍ yath sOmakraya̍ṇyai̍ padaM ~MyajñamuKaṃ̍ havirddhAnE̍ yaṛhi# havirddhAnE prAcI̱ pravartayEyustaṛhi̍ tEnAkṣamupA̱-~jjyAd-yajñamuKa Eva yajñamanu santanOti̍ prA~jcamagniM̍ pra harantyut̍ patnImA nayantyanvanAṃ̍si̍ pra vartayantyatha̍ vA asyaiṣa̍ dhiṣṇiyO̍ hIyatE sO&nu# dhyAyati sa I̱śvarO rudrO BUtvA - [ ] 9

verses.padam: (Padam) prajAmiti# pra - jAm|paśUn|yajamAnasya|śama̍yitOḥ|yaṛhi̍|paśum|AprI̍tamityA-prItam|uda̍~jcam|naya̍nti|taṛhi̍|tasya̍|paśuśrapa̍ṇamiti̍# paśu - śrapaṇam|harEt|tEna̍|Eva|Enam|BAgina̱m|karOti|yaja̍mAnaḥ|vai|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|yaja̍mAnam|vai|Etat|vIti̍|karq.ṣantE|yat|AhavanIyAdityA̱̍ - havanIyA̱t|paśuśrapaṇamiti̍# paśu - śrapaṇam|hara̍nti|saḥ|vA|Eva|syAt|nirmanthya̍miti̍# niḥ - manthya̱m|vA|kuryAt|yajamAnasya|sAtmatvAyEti̍# sAtma - tvAya|yadi̍|paśOḥ|avadAnamitya̍va̍ - dAna̱m|naśyE̱t|Ajyasya|pratyAKyAyamiti̍# prati - AKyAya̱m|avEti|dyEt|sA|Eva|tata̍ḥ̍ ( )|prAyaścittiḥ|yE|paśum|vimathnIranniti̍# vi - mathnIrann|yaḥ|tAn|kAmayEta|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEyuḥ|iti̍|kuvit|a~gga|iti̍|namO̍vRuktivatyEti̍ namOvRukti̍ - vatyA|RucA|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - idhrE|juhuyAt|namOvRuktimiti̍ namaḥ̍ - vRuktim|Eva|EṣAm|vRu~gktE|tAjak|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCanti||10̍ (76) (BUtvA - tataḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: prajAM paśUn. yajamAnasya̍ śamayitOryaṛhi̍# paśumA prItamuda̍~jcaM̍ nayanti̍ taṛhi tasya# paśuśrapaṇaṃ̍ harEt tEnaivainaM̍ BAginaM̍ karOti yajamAnO̍ vA AhavanIyO̍ yajamAnaM̍ ~MvA Etadvi kaṛṣantE̍ yadAhavanIyA̱t̍ paśuśrapaṇaṃq̍ haranti̍ sa vaiva syAnnirmanthya̍M̍ ~MvA kuryAd-yajamAnasya̍ sAtmatvAya yadi# paśOravadAnaM̍ naśyEdAjyasya̍ pratyAKyAyamava# dyEth saiva tataḥ ( ) prAyaścittiryE̍ paśuM ~MvimathnIran.̍ yastAn kAmayEtA &&*rtimArcCEyuriti̍# kuvida~ggEti namO# vRuktivatyarcA&&gnI̱ddhrE juhuyAnnamO# vRuktimEvaiṣA̱M ~MvRu~gktE tAjagArtimArcCanti||10̍ (BUtvA - tataḥ - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) prajApatEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|jAyamAnAḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|jAtAḥ|ca|yAḥ|imAḥ||tasmai̱|prati|prEti̍|vEdaya|cikitvAn|anviti̍|manyatAm||imam|paśum|paśupata̍ iti# paśu - patE|tE|adya|baddhnAmi|agnE|sukRutasyEti̍# su - kRutasya|maddhyE̱||anviti̍|manyasva|suyajEti̍# su - yajA̱|yajAma|juṣṭa̱m|dEvAnA̱m|idam|astu|havyam||prajAnanta iti# pra - jAnantaḥ|pratIti̍|gRuhṇanti|pUrvE̱|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|a~ggE̱Byaḥ|parIti|Acara̍ntamityA̱̍ - carantam||suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|yAhi|pathiBiriti# pathi - Biḥ|dEvayAnairiti# dEva - yAnai̱ḥ|OṣadhIṣu|pratIti̍|tiṣṭha|śarI̍raiḥ||yEṣA̱m|IśE̱|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prajApatErjAya̍mAnAḥ̍ prajA jAtAśca yA imAḥ|tasmai prati pra vEdayacikitvAṃ̍ anu# manyatAM||imaM paśuM paśupatE̍ tE adya baddhnAmyagnE̍ sukRutasya maddhyE̱|anu# manyasva suyajA# yajAma juṣṭaM̍ dEvAnAmidama̍stu̍ havyaM||prajAnantaḥ pratigRuhṇanti̍ pUrvE̱ prAṇama~ggE̱Byaḥ paryAcarantaM|suvargaM̍ ~MyAhi̍ pathiBi# rdEvayAnai-rOṣadhIṣu̍ pratitiṣṭhA̍ śarIraiḥ||yEṣAmIśE̍# - [ ] 11

verses.padam: (Padam) paśapatiriti# paśu-patiḥ|paśUnAm|catu̍ṣpadAmiti̍ catuḥ̍ - padAm|uta|ca|dvipadAmiti# dvi - padA̱m||niṣkrIta̍ iti niḥ - krItaḥ|ayam|yajñiya̱m|BAgam|Etu|rAyaḥ|pOṣA̱ḥ|yajamAnasya|santu||yE|baddhyamA̍nam|anviti̍|baddhyamA̍nAḥ|aByaikṣantEtya̍Bi̍ - aikṣanta|mana̍sA|cakṣu̍ṣA|ca||agniḥ|tAn|agrE̱|prEti̍|mumOktu|dEvaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|saM~MvidAna iti# saM-vidAnaḥ||yE|AraṇyAḥ|paśavaḥ|viśvarU̍pA̍ iti# viśva - rUpAḥ|virUpA̍ iti vi-rUpAḥ|santaḥ|bahudhEti̍# bahu - dhA|EkarUpA̍ ityEka# - rUpAḥ||vAyuḥ|tAn|agrE̱|prEti|mumOktu|dEvaḥ|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajayEti# pra - jayA̱|saM~MvidAna iti# saM - vidAnaḥ||pramu~jcamAnA̍ iti# pra - mu~jcamAnAḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: paśupatiḥ̍ paśUnAM catuṣpadAmuta̍ ca# dvipadA̱M|niṣkrItO&yaM̍ ~MyajñiyaM̍ BAgamEtu̍ rAyaspOṣA yajamAnasya̍ santu||yE baddhyamAnamanu̍# baddhyamAnA̍ aByaikṣanta̍ manasA̍ cakṣuṣA̍ ca|agnistAṃ agrE pramumOktu̍ dEvaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajayA# saM~MvidAnaḥ||ya AraṇyAḥ̍ paśavO# viśvarUpA̍ virUpAḥ̍ santO# bahudhaikarUpAḥ|vAyustAṃ̍ agrE pramumOktu̍ dEvaḥ prajApatiḥ̍ prajayA# saM~MvidAnaḥ||pramu~jcamAnA̍ - [ ] 12

verses.padam: (Padam) Buvanasya|rEta̍ḥ|gAtum|dhatta|yaja̍mAnAya|dEvAḥ||upAkRu̍tamityu̍pa-AkRu̍tam|śaśamAnam|yat|asthA̱t|jIvam|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|Etu|pAtha̍ḥ||nAnA̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|yajamAnasya|paśunA̱|yajñaḥ|dEvEBi̍ḥ|saha|dEvayAna̍ iti# dEva - yAnaḥ||jIvam|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|Etu|pAtha̍ḥ|satyAḥ|santu|yaja̍mAnasya|kAmA̱ḥ||yat|paśuḥ|mAyum|akRu̍ta|ura̍ḥ|vA|padBiriti̍# pat - Biḥ|Ahata ityA̱ - hatE||agniḥ|mA|tasmA̱t|Enasaḥ|viśvA̱t|mu~jcatu|aṃha̍saḥ||śami̍tAraḥ|upEtanEtyu̍pa̍ - Etana|yajñam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Buvanasya̍ rEtO# gAtuM dhatta̍ yajamAnAya̍ dEvAḥ|upAkRutaṃ̍ śaśamAnaM ~MyadasthA̱jjIvaM dEvAnAmapyEtu̍ pAthaḥ||nAnA̱̍ prAṇO yajamAnasya̍ paśunA# yajñO dEvEBiḥ̍ saha dEvayAna̍ḥ|jIvaM̍ dEvAnAmapyEtu̍ pAthaḥ̍ satyAḥ santu̍ yajamAnasya̍ kAmA̱ḥ||yat paśurmAyumakRutOrO# vA padBirAhatE|agnirmA̍ tasmAdEnasO̍ viśvA̱n mu~jcatvaṃhasaḥ||śami̍tAra̍ upEtana̍ yajñaM - [ ] 13

verses.padam: (Padam) dEvEBiḥ|invitam||pAśA̱t|paśum|prEti̍|mu~jcata|bandhAt|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña - patim|pari||adi̍tiḥ|pAśa̱m|prEti̍|mumOktu|Etam|nama̍ḥ|paśuBya̍ iti# paśu - Byaḥ|paśupataya̍ iti# paśu - patayE|karOmi||arAtIyanta̱m|adha̍ram|kRuṇOmi|yam|dviṣmaḥ|tasminn̍|pratIti̍|mu~jcAmi|pAśa̱m||tvAm|u|tE|dadhirE|havyavAhamiti̍# havya - vAha̱m|śRutakaMqrtAramiti# śRutaM - kartAra̱m|uta|yajñiya̱m|ca||agnE̱|sadakṣa̍ iti sa - dakṣaḥ|satanuriti̍ sa-tanuḥ|hi|BUtvA|atha|havyA|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|juṣasva||jAtavEda̍ iti jAta# - vEdaḥ|vapayA̱|gacCa|dEvAn|tvam ( )|hi|hOtA̱|prathamaḥ|baBUtha||GRutEna̍|tvam|tanuva̍ḥ|vad^^rdhayasva|svAhA̍kRutamiti̍ svAhA̱ - kRutam|haviḥ|adantu|dEvAḥ||svAhA̱|dEvEByaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱||14̍ (66) (IśE̱ - pramu~jcamAnA̍ - yajñaM - tvaṃ - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A4)
verses.samhita: dEvEBirinvitaM|pAśA̱t̍ paśuM pramu~jcata̍ bandhAdyajñapatiM̍ pari||adi̍tiḥ̍ pAśaM pramumOktvEtaM̍ namaḥ̍ paśuByaḥ̍ paśupatayE̍ karOmi||arAtIyanta-madharaM̍ kRuṇOmi yaM dviṣmastasmin prati# mu~jcAmi pAśa̱M||tvAmu tE dadhirE̍ havyavAhaṃ# śRutaMkartAramuta̍ yajñiyaM̍ ca|agnE sadakṣaḥ̍ satanurqḥi̍ BUtvA&tha# havyA jAtavEdO̍ juṣasva||jAtavEdO̍ vapayA# gacCa dEvAntvaṃ ( ) hi hOtA̱ prathamO baBUtha|GRutEna̍ tvaM tanuvO# varddhayasva svAhAkRutaṃ̍ haviradantu̍ dEvAḥ||svAhA# dEvEByO# dEvEByaḥ svAhA̱||14

verses.padam: (Padam) prAjApatyA iti# prAjA - patyAḥ|vai|paśavaḥ|tEṣA̱m|rudraḥ|adhi̍patirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|yat|EtAByA̱m|upAkarOtItyupa̍ - AkarOti|tAByA̱m|Eva|Enam|pratiprOcyEti̍# prati - prOcya|Eti̍|laBatE|Atmana̍ḥ|anA̱vraskAyEtyanA̱̍ - vraskAya|dvAByA̱m|upAkarAtItyu̍pa̍ - AkarOti|dvipAditi̍# dvi - pAt|yajamAnaḥ|prati̍ṣṭhityA̍ iti prati# - sthityai|upAkRutyEtyupa̍ - AkRutya|pa~jca̍|juhOti|pA~gktA̱ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|mRutyavE̱|vai|Eṣaḥ|nIyatE|yat|paśuḥ|tam|yat|anvAraBEtEtya̍nu̍ - AraBEta|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|syAt|nAnA̱|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|yajamAnasya|paśunA̱|iti̍|Aha|vyAvRu̍ttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai|15̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAjApatyA vai paśavastEṣAṃ# rudrO&dhipatirya-dEtAByA̍-mupA̍ karOti tAByAmEvaina̍M̍ pratiprOcyA&&laBata̍ AtmanO&nA̱vraskAya dvAByAmupAka̍rOti̍ dvipAdyajamAnaḥ̍ pratiṣṭhityA̍ upAkRutya pa~jca# juhOti pA~gktA̱ḥ paśavaḥ̍ paśUnEvA varundhEmRutyavE̍ vA Eṣa nIyatE̍ yat paśustaM ~MyadanvAraBE̍ta̍ pramAyukO̍ yajamAnaḥ̍ syAnnAnA̱ prAṇO yajamAnasya̍ paśunEtyAha̍ vyAvRuttyai̍ - [ ] 15

verses.padam: (Padam) yat|paśuḥ|mAyum|akRuta|iti̍|juhOti|śAntyai̱|śami̍tAraḥ|upEtanEtyu̍pa̍ - Etana|iti̍|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA - yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|vapAyA̱m|vai|AhriyamAṇAyAmityA̱̍ - hriyamAṇAyAm|agnEḥ|mEdha̍ḥ|apEti̍|krAmati|tvAm|u|tE|dadhirE|havyavAhamiti̍# havya - vAha̱m|iti|vapAm|aBIti̍|juhOti|agnEḥ|Eva|mEdha̱m|avEti̍|rundhE|athO̍ iti|śRutatvAyEti̍# śRuta - tvAya|purastA̱thsvAhAkRutaya̍ iti# purastA̱t - svAhAkRutayaḥ|vai|anyE|dEvAḥ|upariṣṭAthsvAhAkRutaya̍ ityupariṣṭAt̍ - svAhAkRutayaḥ|anyE|svAhA̱|dEvEByaḥ|dEvEBya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|iti̍|aBita̍ḥ|vapAm̍ ( )|juhOti|tAn|Eva|uBayAn|prIṇAti||16̍ (55)
verses.samhita: yat paśurmAyumakRutEti# juhOti śAntyai śamitAra̍ upEtanEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitadvapAyAM ~MvA A̱hriyamAṇAyA-magnErmEdhO&pa̍# krAmati tvAmu tE dadhirE̍ havyavAhamiti# vapAmaBi juhOtyagnErEva̍ mEdhamava# rundhE&thO# śRutatvAya# purastA̱th svAhA kRutayO vA anyE dEvA upariṣṭAth̍ svAhAkRutayO&nyE svAhA# dEvEByO# dEvEByaḥ svAhEtyaBitO# vapAM ( ) juhOti̍ tAnEvOBayA̱n prIṇAti||16

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|vai|ayathAdEvatamityaya̍thA̍ - dEvatam|yajñam|upacaratItyupa̍ - carati|Eti̍|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|vRuścyatE|pApI̍yAn|Bavati|yaḥ|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA-dEvatam|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti|vRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|AgnEyyA|RucA|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni̍# - iddhram|aBIti|mRuśEt|vaiṣṇavyA|havid^^rdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|AgnEyyA|srucaḥ|vAyavya̍yA|vAyavyA̍ni|aindriyA|sada̍ḥ|yathAdEvatamiti̍# yathA-dEvatam|Eva|yajñam|upEti|carati|na|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|Eti̍|vRuścyatE|vasI̍yAn|Bavati|yunajmi̍|tE|pRuthivIm|jyOti̍ṣA|saha|yunajmi̍|vAyum|antari̍kṣEṇa|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO vA ayathAdEvataM̍ ~MyajñamupacaratyA̍ dEvatA̱ByO vRuścyatE pApIyAn̍ Bavati yO yathAdEvatanna̍ dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE̍ vasIyAn̍ BavatyAgnEyyarcA &&gnI̱ddhramaBi mRuśEd̍ vaiṣṇavyA havirddhAna̍mAgnEyyA̍ srucO# vAyavyayA̍ vAyavyA̱nyaindriyA sadO# yathAdEvatamEva yajñamupa# carati na dEvatA̱Bya A vRuścyatE̍ vasIyAn̍ Bavati yunajmi# tE pRuthivIM jyOtiṣA̍ saha yunajmi# vAyumantarikṣEṇa̍ - [ ] 17

verses.padam: (Padam) tE|saha|yunajmi|vAca̱m|saha|sUryE̍ṇa|tE|yunajmi̍|tisraḥ|vipRuca̍ iti# vi - pRucaḥ|sUrya̍sya|tE||agniḥ|dEvatA̱|gAyatrI|Canda̍ḥ|upAṃqśOrityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśOḥ|pAtra̱m|asi|sOmaḥ|dEvatA̱|triṣṭup|Canda̍ḥ|antaryAmasyEtya̍ntaḥ̍ - yAmasya|pAtra̱m|asi|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|jaga̍tI|Canda̍ḥ|indravAyuvOritI̱ndra-vAyuvOḥ|pAtra̱m|asi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|anuṣṭubitya̍nu̍ - stup|Candaḥ|mitrAvaru̍ṇayOriti̍# mitrA-varuṇayOḥ|pAtra̱m|asi|aśvinau̱|dEvatA̱|pa~gktiḥ|Canda̍ḥ|aśvinO̱ḥ|pAtra̱m|asi|sUrya̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|bRuhatI|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: tE saha yunajmi vAcaṃ# saha sUryEṇa̍ tE yunajmi# tisrO vipRucaḥ sUryasya̍ tE|agnirdEvatA# gAyatrI Canda# upAṃqśOḥ pAtramasi̍ sOmO# dEvatA̱ triṣṭup CandO̱&ntaryAmasya pAtramasIndrO̍# dEvatA jagatI̍ Canda# indravAyuvOḥ pAtramasi̍ bRuhaspatir̍ dEvatA&nuṣṭup̍ CandO# mitrAvaruṇayOḥ̍ pAtramasyaśvinau̍# dEvatA# pa~gktiśCandO&śvinOḥ pAtramasi̍ sUryO# dEvatA# bRuhatI - [ ] 18

verses.padam: (Padam) Candaḥ|śukrasya̍|pAtra̱m|asi|candramA̱ḥ|dEvatA̱|satObRu̍hatIti̍# sataḥ - bRuhatI|Candaḥ|manthina̍ḥ|pAtra̱m|asi|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|dEvatA̱|uṣṇihA̱|Canda̍ḥ|Agrayaṇasya̍|pAtra̱m|asi|indra̍ḥ|dEvatA̱|kakut|Canda̍ḥ|ukthAnA̱m|pAtra̱m|asi|pRuthivI|dEvatA̱|virAḍiti̍# vi - rAṭ|Candaḥ|dhruvasya̍|pAtra̱m|asi||19̍ (33) (antarikṣEṇa̍ - bRuhatI - trayastriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: Candaḥ̍ śukrasya pAtramasi̍ candramA# dEvatA# satO bRuhatI̍ CandO# manthinaḥ pAtramasi̍ viśvEdEvA̍ dEvatOṣṇihA Canda# Agrayaṇasya pAtramasIndrO̍# dEvatA# kakucCanda# ukthAnAM pAtramasi̍ pRuthivI dEvatA# virAṭ CandO̱ dhruvasya pAtramasi||19̍ (antarikṣEṇa̍ - bRuhatI - trayastriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) iṣṭargaḥ|vai|addhvaryuḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|iṣṭarga̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai|pUrva̍ḥ|arṣṭuḥ|kṣIyatE|AsanyA̱t|mA|mantrA̱t|pAhi|kasyA̱ḥ|cit|aBiśa̍styA̍ ityaBi - śastyAḥ|iti|purA|prAtaranuvAkAditi̍# prAtaḥ - anuvAkAt|juhuyAt|AtmanE̱|Eva|tat|addhvaryuḥ|purastA̱t|śarma|nahyatE|anA̱rtyai|saM~MvEśAyEti̍# saM - vEśAya|tvA|upavEśAyEtu̍pa̍ - vEśAya|tvA|gAyatriyAḥ|triṣṭuBa̍ḥ|jaga̍tyAḥ|aBiBU̱tyA̍ ityaBi - BUtyai|svAhA̱|prAṇApAnAviti̍ prAṇa# - apAnau|mRutyOḥ|mA|pAtam|prAṇApAnAviti̍ prAṇa# - apAnau|mA|mA|hAsiṣṭam|dEvatAsu|vai|EtE|prAṇApAnayOriti̍# prAṇa - apAnayO̱ḥ|20 (50)
verses.samhita: iṣṭargO vA addhvaryuryaja̍mAnasyEṣṭargaḥ̍ Kalu vai pUrvO&rṣṭuḥ kṣIyata̍ AsanyA̱nmA mantrA̱t pAhi kasyA̱ścidaBiśastyA̍ iti# purA prAtaranuvAkAjju̍huyAdAtmana̍# Eva tadaddhvaryuḥ̍ purastAcCarma# nahyatE&nA̱rtyai saM~MvEśAya# tvOpavEśAya# tvA gAyatriyA striṣṭuBO jagatyA̍ aBiBU̱tyai svAhA prAṇApAnau̍ mRutyOrmA# pAtaM prAṇApAnau̍ mA mA# hAsiṣṭaM dEvatAsu̍ vA EtE prAṇApAnayOr̍ - [ ] 20

verses.padam: (Padam) vyAyacCanta̍ iti# vi - AyacCantE|yEṣA̱m|sOma̍ḥ|samRucCata̍ iti# saM - RucCatE̱|saM~MvEśAyEti# saM - vEśAya|tvA|upavEśAyEtyu̍pa̍ - vEśAya|tvA|iti̍|Aha|CandAṃ̍si|vai|saM~MvEśa̍ iti# saM - vEśaḥ|upavEśa ityupa̍ - vEśaḥ|CandOBiriti̍ Candaḥ̍ - Biḥ|Eva|asya|CandAṃsi|vRu~gktE|prEti̍vantIti̍ prEti# - vanti|AjyAni|Bavanti|aBiji̍tyA̍ ityaBi - jityai|marutvatIḥ|pratipada̍ iti# prati - padaḥ|viji̍tyA̍ iti vi - jityai|uBE iti|bRuhadrathantarE̍ iti# bRuhat - rathantarE|Bavataḥ|iyam|vAva|rathantaramiti# ratham-taram|asau|bRuhat|AByAm|Eva|Enam|antaḥ|Eti|adya|vAva|rathantaramiti# ratham - taram|śvaḥ|bRuhat|adyAśvAdityadya̍ - śvAt|Eva|Enam|antaḥ|Eti|BUtam|21 (50)
verses.samhita: vyAyacCantE̍ yEṣAṃq sOmaḥ̍ samRucCatE# saM~MvEśAya# tvOpavEśAya tvEtyAha̍ CandAṃsi̍ vai saM~MvEśa̍ upavEśaśCandO̍BirEvAsya̍ CandAṃsi̍ vRu~gktE prEtivantyAjyA̍ni̍ BavantyaBijityai̍ marutvatIḥ̍ pratipadO vijityA̍ uBE bRuhadrathantarE̍ Bavata̍ iyaM ~MvAva rathantaramasau̍ bRuhadAByAmEvainamantarE̱tyadya̍ vAva rathantaraṅ̍ śvO bRuhadadyAśvA̍ dEvainamantarE̍ti̍ BUtaM - [ ] 21

verses.padam: (Padam) vAva|rathantaramiti# ratham - taram|Baviṣyat|bRuhat|BUtAt|ca|Eva|Enam|Baviṣyataḥ|ca|antaḥ|Eti|parimitamiti̍ pari# - mitam|vAva|rathantaramiti# ratham - taram|aparimitamityapa̍ri̍ - mitam|bRuhat|parimitAditi̍ pari# - mitAt|ca|Eva|Enam|aparimitAdityapa̍ri̍ - mitAt|ca|antaḥ|Eti|viśvAmitrajamadagnI iti# viśvAmitra - jamadagnI|vasiṣṭhEna|aspad^^rdhEtAm|saḥ|Etat|jamada̍gniḥ|vihavya̍miti̍# vi - havya̱m|apaśyat|tEna|vai|saḥ|vasi̍ṣṭhasya|indriyam|vIrya̱m|avRu~gkta|yat|vihavya̍miti̍# vi - havya̱m|śasyatE̱|indriyam|Eva|tat|vIrya̱m|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyasya|vRu~gktE̍ ( )|yasya|BUyAṃ̍saḥ|yajñakratava̍ iti# yajña - kratavaḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|saḥ|dEvatA̱ḥ|vRu~gktE|iti̍|yadi̍|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni-stOmaḥ|sOma̍ḥ|parastA̱t|syAt|ukthya̱m|kurvIta|yadi̍|ukthya̍ḥ|syAt|atirAtramitya̍ti̍ - rAtram|kurvIta|yajñakratuBiriti# yajñakratu - Biḥ|Eva|asya|dEvatA̱ḥ|vRu~gktE|vasIyAn|Bavati||22̍ (78) (prAṇApAnayO̱ - rBUtaM - ~MvRu~gktE̍ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: ~MvAva rathantaraM̍ Baviṣyad-bRuqhad̍ BUtAccaivainaM̍ BaviṣyataścAntarEti,̍ parimitaM̍ ~MvAva rathantaramapa̍rimitaM̍ bRuhat parimitAccaivaina-mapa̍rimitAccA&ntarE̍ti̍ viśvAmitrajamadagnI vasiṣṭhEnAsparddhEtAṃqsa̍ Etajjamadagni̍ rvihavyama̍ paśyat tEna vai sa vasiṣṭhasyEndriyaM̍ ~MvIryamavRu~gkta̍ yadvihavyaṃ̍# śasyata# indriyamEva tadvIryaM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyasya̍ vRu~gktE ( ) yasya BUyAṃsO̍ yajñakratava ityAhuḥ̍ sa dEvatA# vRu~gkta iti yadyagniṣṭOmaḥ̍ sOmaḥ̍ parastAth syA-dukthyaM̍ kurvIta yadyukthyaḥ̍ syAdatirAtraM̍ kurvIta̍ yajñakratuBirEvAsya̍# dEvatA# vRu~gktE vasIyAn̍ Bavati||22 (prAṇApAnayO̱ - rBUtaM - ~MvRu~gktE̍ - &ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: (Padam) nigrAByA# iti# ni - grAByA̱ḥ|stha|dEvaśruta iti# dEva - śrutaḥ|Ayu̍ḥ|mE|tarpayata|prAṇamiti̍# pra- anam|ma|tarpayata|apAnamityapa̍ - anam|mE|tarpayata|vyAnamiti# vi - anam|mE|tarpayata|cakṣuḥ|mE|tarpayata|śrOtra̱m|mE|tarpayata|mana̍ḥ|mE|tarpayata|vAca̱m|mE|tarpayata|AtmAna̱m|mE|tarpayata|a~ggA̍ni|ma|tarpayata|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mE|tarpayata|paśUn|mE|tarpayata|gRuhAn|mE|tarpayata|gaṇAn|mE|tarpayata|sarvagaṇamiti̍# sarva - gaṇam|mA|tarpayata|tarpayata|mA|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: nigrAByA̱ḥ stha dEvaśruta AyurmE̍ tarpayata prAṇaM mE# tarpayatApAnaM mE# tarpayata vyAnaM mE# tarpayata cakṣurmE̍ tarpayata śrOtraM̍ mE tarpayata manOmE̍ tarpayata vAcaM̍ mE tarpayatA&&*tmAnaM̍ mE tarpayatA~ggAni̍ mE tarpayata prajAM mE# tarpayata paśUn mE# tarpayata gRuhAn mE# tarpayata gaṇAn mE# tarpayata sarvagaṇaM̍ mA tarpayata tarpayata̍ mA - [ ] 23

verses.padam: (Padam) gaṇAḥ|mE|mA|vIti|tRuṣann|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|vai|sOma̍sya|viśa̍ḥ|viśa̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai|rAjña̍ḥ|pradA̍tOriti̍ pra - dAtOḥ|IśvarAḥ|aindraḥ|sOmaḥ|avI̍vRudham|vaḥ|mana̍sA|sujAtA̍ iti# su - jAtAḥ|RutaprajAtA̍ ityRuta# - prajAtAḥ|BagE̱|it|vaḥ|syAma||indrEṇa|dEvIḥ|vIrudha̍ḥ|saM~MvidAnA̍ iti# saM - vidAnAḥ|anviti|manyantAm|sava̍nAya|sOma̱m|iti̍|Aha|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|svAyai̱|viśaḥ|svAyai̱|dEvatAyai|niryAcyEti̍# niḥ - yAcya|aBIti̍|sunOti|yaḥ|vai|sOma̍sya|aBiṣUyamA̍ṇasyEtya̍Bi̍ - sUyamAṇasya|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gaṇA mE mA vi tRuṣannOṣa̍dhayO̍ vai sOmasya̍ viśO viśaḥ Kalu vai rAjñaḥ pradAtOrIśvarA̍ aindraḥ sOmO&vIvRudhaM̍ ~MvO manasA̍ sujAtA RutaprajAtA̍ Baga idvaḥ̍ syAma|indrEṇa̍ dEvIrvIrudhaḥ̍ saM~MvidAnA anu# manyantAṃq savanAya̍ sOmamityAhauṣadhIBya̍ Evainaṅq svAyai# viśaḥ svAyai# dEvatAyai̍ niryAcyABi ṣuṇOti̍ yO vai sOmasyABiṣUyamA̍ṇasya̍ - [ ] 24

verses.padam: (Padam) prathamaḥ|aṃqśuḥ|skandati|saḥ|Iśvaraḥ|indriyam|vIrya̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|paśUn|yajamAnasya|niṛha̍ntOriti̍ niḥ - hantOḥ|tam|aBIti|mantrayEta|Eti̍|mA|askAn|saha|prajayEti̍# pra - jayA̱|saha|rAyaḥ|pOṣEṇa|indriyam|mE|vIrya̱m|mA|niriti̍|vadhIḥ|iti̍|AśiṣamityA̱-śiṣa̱m|Eva|EtAm|Eti̍|śAstE|indriyasya̍|vIrya̍sya|prajAyA̍ iti# pra - jAyai̱|paśUnAm|anirGAtAyEtyani̍ḥ̍ - GAtAya|draPsaḥ|caskanda|pRuthivIm|anviti|dyAm|imam|ca|yOni̱m|anviti̍|yaḥ|ca̍ ( )|pUrvaḥ|tRutIya̱m|yOni̱m|anviti̍|sa~jcara̍ntamiti̍# saM - carantam|draPsam|juhOmi|anviti̍|sapta|hOtrA̱ḥ||25̍ (60)
verses.samhita: prathamO&ṃśuḥ̍ skandati̍ sa I̱śvara indriyaM̍ ~MvIryaM̍ prajAM paśUn. yajamAnasya̍ niṛhantOstamaBi̍ mantrayEtA&&̍ mA̱&skAnthsaha prajayA# saha rAyaspOṣEṇEndriyaM̍ mE# vIryaM̍ mA nivarddhIrityAśiṣa̍mEvaitAmA̍ śA̱sta indriyasya# vIyaṛsya̍ prajAyai# paśUnAmanirGAtAya̍ draPsaścaskanda̍ pRuthivImanu dyAmima~jca yOnimanu yaśca ( ) pUrvaḥ|tRutIyaM̍ ~MyOnimanu# sa~jcarantaM̍ draPsaM juhOmyanu̍# sapta hOtrA̱ḥ||25

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|vai|dEvAn|dEvayaśasEnEti# dEva - yaśasEna|arpaya̍ti|manuṣyAn̍|manuṣyayaśasEnEti̍# manuṣya - yaśasEna|dEvayaśasIti̍# dEva - yaśasI|Eva|dEvEṣu|Bava̍ti|manuṣyayaśasIti̍# manuṣya-yaśasI|manuṣyEṣu|yAn|prAcIna̱m|AgrayaṇAt|grahAn̍|gRuhṇIyAt|tAn|upAṅqśvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśu|gRuhṇIyAt|yAn|Ud^^rdhvAn|tAn|upabdimata ityupabdi̍ - mataḥ|dEvAn|Eva|tat|dEvayaśasEnEti̍# dEva - yaśasEna|arpayati|manuṣyAn̍|manuṣyayaśasEnEti̍# manuṣya - yaśasEna|dEvayaśasIti̍# dEva - yaśasI|Eva|dEvEṣu|Bavati|manuṣyayaśasIti̍# manuṣya - yaśasI|manuṣyEṣu|agniḥ|prAtassavana̍ iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|pAtu|asmAn|vaiśvAnaraḥ|mahinA|viśvaśamBUriti̍# viśva - śamBUḥ||saḥ|naḥ|pAvakaḥ|draviṇam|dadhAtu|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO vai dEvAn dEvayaśasEnArpaya̍ti̍ manuṣyA̱n manuṣyayaśasEna# dEvayaśasyEva̍ dEvEṣu Bavati̍ manuṣyayaśasI manuṣyE̍ṣu̍ yAn prAcIna-mAgrayaṇAd̍ grahA̱n gRuhṇIyAt tAnupAṃqśu̍ gRuhṇIyAdyAnUrddhvAṅstAnu̍pabdimatO̍# dEvAnEva taddEvayaśasEnA̱rpayati̍ manuṣyA̱n manuṣyayaśasEna# dEvayaśasyEva̍ dEvEṣu# Bavati manuṣyayaśasI manuṣyE̱ṣvagniḥ̍ prAtassavanE̍ pA̱tvasmAn. vai̱śvAnarO mahinA̍ viśvaśamBUḥ|sa̍ naḥ̍ pAvakO draviṇaM̍ dadhAtvA - [ ] 26

verses.padam: (Padam) Ayuṣmantaḥ|sahaBa̍kṣA̍ iti# saha-BakṣAḥ|syAma||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|marutaḥ|indra̍ḥ|asmAn|asminn|dvitIyE̱|sava̍nE|na|jahyuḥ||Ayu̍ṣmantaḥ|priyam|EṣAm|vada̍ntaḥ|vayam|dEvAnA̱m|sumatAviti̍# su - matau|syAma||idam|tRutIya̱m|savanam|kavInAm|RutEna̍|yE|camasam|aira̍yanta||tE|saudhanvanAḥ|suva̍ḥ|AnaśAnAḥ|svi̍ṣṭimiti̍ su - iṣṭim|naḥ|aBIti|vasI̍yaḥ|nayantu||Ayata̍navatIrityAyata̍na̍ - vatIḥ|vai|anyAḥ|Ahutaya̍ ityA - hutayaḥ|hUyantE̱|anAyatanA ityanA̍ - yatanAḥ|anyAḥ|yAḥ|AGAravatIrityA̍GAra̍ - vatIḥ|tAḥ|AyatanavatIrityAyata̍na̍ - vatIḥ|yAḥ|27 (50)
verses.samhita: yuṣmantaḥ̍ sahaBakṣAḥ̍ syAma||viśvE# dEvA maruta indrO# asmAnasmin dvitIyE savanE̍ na jahyuḥ|Ayu̍ṣmantaḥ̍ priyamEṣAM̍ ~MvadantO̍ vayaM dEvAnAṃ# sumatau syAma||idaM̍ tRutIyaṃq savanaM̍ kavInAmRutEna yE camasamaira̍yanta|tE̍ saudhanvanAḥ̍ suvarAnaśAnAḥ̍ sviṣṭiM̍ nO aBi vasIyO̍ nayantu||AyatanavatIrvA̍ anyA AhutayO̍ hUyantE&nAyatanA̍ anyA yA AGArava̍tIstA̍ AyatanavatIryAḥ̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: (Padam) saumyAḥ|tAḥ|anAyatanA ityanA̍ - yatanAḥ|aindravAyavamityai̱ndra - vAyavam|AdAyEtyA̱ - dAya|AGAramityA̱̍ - GAram|Eti|GArayEt|addhvaraḥ|yajñaḥ|ayam|astu|dEvAḥ|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi-Byaḥ|paśavE̱|naḥ|janA̍ya|viśva̍smai|BUtAya̍|adhvaraḥ|asi|saḥ|pinvasva|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta - vat|dEva|sOma|iti|saumyAḥ|Eva|tat|Ahu̍tIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|AyatanavatIrityAyata̍na̍ - vatIḥ|karOti|AyatanavAnityAyata̍na̍ - vAn|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|athO̍ iti|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|Eva|GRutEna|vIti̍|unatti|tE̍ iti|vyu̍ttE̍ iti vi - uttE|upajIvanIyE ityupa̍ - jIvanIyE̱|Bavataḥ|upajIvanIya ityupa̍ - jIvanIyaḥ|Bavati|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: saumyAstA anAyatanA̍ ai̱ndravAyava-mAdAyA&&*GAramA̍ GArayEdaddhvarO̍ yajñO&yama̍stu̍ dEvA OṣadhIByaḥ̍ paśavE# nO janAya̍ viśvasmai̍ BUtAyA̱&ddhvarO&si̍ sa pinvasva̍ GRutavaddEva̍ sOmEti# saumyA Eva tadAhutIrAyata̍navatIḥ̍ karOtyAyatanavAn̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEdAthO dyAvApRuthivI̍ Eva GRutEna vyunatti̍ tE vyuttE̍ upajIvanIyE# Bavata upajIvanIyO# Bavati - [ ] 28

verses.padam: (Padam) yaḥ|Evam|vEda|Eṣaḥ|tE|rudra|BAgaḥ|yam|nirayA̍cathA̍ iti# niḥ-ayAcathAḥ|tam|juṣasva|vidEḥ|gaupatyam|rAyaḥ|pOṣa̱m|suvIryamiti̍# su - vIrya̱m|saM~MvathsarIṇAmiti# saM - vathsarIṇA̱m|svastim||manuḥ|putrEBya̍ḥ|dAyam|vIti̍|aBajat|saḥ|nABAnEdi̍ṣṭham|brahmacaryamiti̍# brahma-carya̱m|vasantam|niriti̍|aBajat|saḥ|Eti̍|agacCat|saḥ|abravIt|kathA|mA|niriti̍|aBAk|iti̍|na|tvA|niriti̍|aBAkṣam|iti̍|abravIt|a~ggi̍rasaḥ|imE|satram|AsatE|tE|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ya EvaM ~MvEdaiṣa tE# rudraBAgO yaM nirayAcathAstaM̍ juṣasva̍ vidErgaupatyaṃ̍ rAyaspOṣaṃ# suvIryaṃ# saM~MvathsarIṇAṅ# svastiM||manuḥ̍ putrEByO# dAyaM ~MvyaBajath̍ sa nABAnEdiṣṭhaM̍ brahmacaryaM ~MvasantaM̍ niraBajath̍ sa A&gacCath̍ sO̱&bravIt kathA mA niraBAgiti̍ na tvA niraBAkṣamitya̍-bravIda~ggi̍rasa̍ imE satramAsatE̍ tE - [ ] 29

verses.padam: (Padam) suvargamiti# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|na|prEti|jAnanti|tEBya̍ḥ|idam|brAhma̍ṇam|brUhi|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|yE|EṣAm|paśava̍ḥ|tAn|tE|dAsyanti|iti̍|tat|EByaḥ|abravIt|tE|suvargamiti̍# suvaḥ - gam|lOkam|yantaḥ|yE|EṣAm|paśava̍ḥ|Asann̍|tAn|asmai|adaduḥ|tam|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|carantam|yajñavAstAviti̍# yajña-vAstau|rudraḥ|Eti|agacCat|saḥ|abravIt|mama̍|vai|imE|paśava̍ḥ|iti̍|adu̍ḥ|vai|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM na prajAnanti̍ tEBya# idaM brAhmaṇaM̍ brUhi tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyantO ya EṣAM̍ paśavastAṅstE# dAsyantIti tadE̱ByO&bravIt tE suvargaM̍ ~MlOkaM ~MyantO ya EṣAM̍ paśava Asan tAnasmA̍ adadustaM paśuBiścarantaM̍ ~MyajñavAstau rudra A&gacCath̍ sO̱&bravInmama vA imE paśava ityadurvai - [ ] 30

verses.padam: (Padam) mahya̱m|imAn|iti|abravIt|na|vai|tasya̍|tE|IśatE|iti̍|abravIt|yat|yajñavAstAviti̍# yajña-vAstau|hIyatE|mama̍|vai|tat|iti̍|tasmA̱t|yajñavAstviti̍# yajña - vAstu|na|aByavEtyamityaBi̍ - avEtya̱m|saḥ|abravIt|yajñE|mA|Eti|Baja|atha̍|tE|paśUn|na|aBIti̍|maṅqsyE|iti̍|tasmai̱|Etam|manthina̍ḥ|saṅqsrAvamiti̍# saM - srAvam|ajuhOt|tataḥ|vai|tasya̍|rudraḥ|paśUn|na|aBIti̍|amanyata|yatra̍|Etam̍ ( )|Evam|vidvAn|manthinaḥ|saṅqsrAvamiti̍# saM - srAvam|juhOti|na|tatra̍|rudraḥ|paśUn|aBIti̍|manyata||31̍ (61)
verses.samhita: mahyamimAnitya̍bravInna̍ vai tasya ta Iśata̍ ityabravId-yad-ya̍jñavAstau̍ hIyatE̍ mama vai taditi tasmA̱d-yajñavAstu nAByavEtyaṃq sO̱&bravId-yajñE mA &&BajAtha# tE paśUn nABi maṅsya̍ iti tasmA# EtaM manthinaḥ̍ saṅ srAvamajuhOt̍ tatO vai tasya# rudraḥ paśUn nAByamanyata̍ yatraita ( ) mEvaM ~MvidvAn manthinaḥ̍ saṅ srAvaM juhOti na tatra# rudraḥ paśUnaBi manyatE||31̍

verses.padam: (Padam) juṣṭaḥ|vAcaḥ|BUyAsam|juṣṭa̍ḥ|vAcaḥ|pata̍yE|dEvi̍|vAk||yat|vAcaḥ|madhu̍maditi̍ madhu-mat|tasminn̍|mA|dhAḥ|svAhA̱|sara̍svatyai||RucA|stOma̱m|samiti̍|ad^^rdhaya|gAyatrEṇa̍|rathantaramiti̍# rathaM-taram||bRuhat|gAyatravartanIti̍# gAyatra-vartani||yaḥ|tE|draPsaḥ|skandati|yaḥ|tE|aṃqśuḥ|bAhucyu̍ta̍ iti# bAhu - cyutaḥ|dhiṣaṇayOḥ|upasthAdityupa̍ - sthAt||addhvaryOḥ|vA|parIti|yaḥ|tE|pavitrA̱t|svAhA̍kRutamiti̍ svAhA̱ -kRutam|indrAya|tam|juhOmi||yaḥ|draPsaḥ|aṃqśuḥ|patitaḥ|pRuthivyAm|parivApAditi̍# pari - vApAt|32 (50)
verses.samhita: juṣṭO# vAcO BUyAsaM̍ juṣṭO# vAcaspatayE̍ dEvi# vAk|yadvAcO madhumat̍ tasmin̍ mA dhAḥ svAhA sarasvatyai||RucA̍ stOmaṃq samarddhaya̍ gAyatrEṇa# rathaMtaraM|bRuhad-gAyatrava̍rtani||yastE̱̍ draPsaḥ skandati̍ yastE# aṃqśurbAhucyutO̍ dhiṣaṇayOrupasthA̱t|addhvaryOrvA̍ pari yastE# pavitrAth svAhAkRutamindrA̍ya̍ taM juhOmi||yO̍ draPsO aṃqśuḥ patitaḥ̍ pRuthivyAM̍ parivApAt̍ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: (Padam) purOḍAśA̱t|karamBAt||dhAnAsOmAditi# dhAnA-sOmAt|manthinaḥ|indra|śukrAt|svAhA̍kRutamiti̍ svAhA̱ - kRutam|indrAya|tam|juhOmi||yaḥ|tE|draPsaḥ|madhu̍mAniti̍ madhu# - mAn|indriyAvAnitI̱ndriya - vAn|svAhAkRuta̍ iti svAhA̱-kRutaḥ|punaḥ|apyEtItya̍pi̍ - Eti|dEvAn||divaḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|parIti̍|antari̍kṣAt|svAhA̍kRutamiti̍ svAhA̱ - kRutam|indrAya|tam|juhOmi||addhvaryuḥ|vai|RutvijA̱m|prathamaḥ|yujyatE|tEna̍|stOma̍ḥ|yOktavya̍ḥ|iti̍|Ahuḥ|vAk|agrEgA̍ ityagrE̍ - gAḥ|agra̱|Etu|RujugA ityRuju̍ - gAḥ|dEvEByaḥ|yaśa̍ḥ|mayi̍|dadha̍tI|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|paśuṣu|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|mayi|33̍ (50)
verses.samhita: purOḍAśA̱t̍ karamBAt|dhAnAsOmAnmanthina# indra śukrAth svAhAkRutamindrA̍ya̍ taM juhOmi||yastE̱̍ draPsO madhumAṃ̍ indriyAvAnth svAhAkRutaḥ̍ punarapyEti̍# dEvAn|divaḥ pRuthivyAḥ̍ paryantarikṣAth̍ svAhA# kRutamindrAya̍ taM juhOmi||addhvaryurvA̍ RutvijA̱M prathamO yujyatE̍ tEna stOmO# yOktavya# ityAhurvAga̍grEgA̍ agra# EtvRujugA dEvEByO yaśO mayi dadhatI̍ prAṇAn paśuṣu# prajAM mayi-̍ [ ] 33

verses.padam: (Padam) ca|yajamAnE|ca|iti̍|Aha|vAca̱m|Eva|tat|yajñamuKa̍ iti# yajña - muKE|yunakti|vAstu|vai|Etat|yajñasya̍|kriyatE|yat|grahAn̍|gRuhItvA|bahiṣpavamAnamiti̍# bahiḥ - pavamAnam|sarpanti|parA̱~jcaḥ|hi|yanti̍|parA̍cIBiḥ|stuvatE̱|vaiṣṇavyA|RucA|puna̍ḥ|EtyEtyA̱̍ - itya|upEti̍|tiṣṭhatE|yajñaḥ|vai|viṣṇu̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|akaḥ|viṣṇO̍ iti|tvam|naḥ|anta̍maḥ|śarma̍|yacCa|sahantya||prEti̍|tE|dhArA̱ḥ|madhuścuta̍ iti# madhu-ścutaḥ|uthsa̱m|duhratE̍ ( )|akṣitam|iti̍|Aha|yat|Eva|asya|śayA̍nasya|upaśuṣyatItyu̍pa̍ - śuṣyati|tat|Eva|asya|EtEna̍|Eti̍|pyAyayati||34̍ (64)
verses.samhita: ca yajamAnE̍ cEtyAha̍ vAcamEva̍ tadyajñamuKE̍ yunakti̍ vAstu vA Etadyajñasya# kriyatE yadgrahA̱n gRuhItvA bahiṣpavamAnaṃ̍ sarpantiparA̱~jcO̍ hi yanti parAcIBiḥ̍ stuvatE# vaiṣṇavyarcA punarEtyOpa# tiṣṭhatE yajñO vai viṣṇu# ryajñamEvAkarviṣṇO tvannO antamaḥ̍ śarma# yacCa sahantya|pra tE dhArA# madhuścuta uthsaM̍ duhratE ( ) akṣitamityA̍ha̍ yadEvAsya śayAnasyOpaśuṣya̍ti̍ tadEvAsyaitEnA &&*pyAyayati||34̍

verses.padam: (Padam) agninA̱|rayim|aśnavat|pOṣa̱m|Eva|divEdiva̍ iti# divE - diva||yaśasa̱m|vIravattamamiti̍# vIravat̍ - tamam||gOmAniti gO - mAn|agnE|avimAnityavi̍# - mAn|aśvI|yajñaḥ|nRuvathsaKEti# nRuvat - saKA|sada̱m|it|apramRuṣya ityapra̍ - mRuṣyaḥ||iḍAvAnitIḍA̱̍ - vAn|Eṣaḥ|asura|prajAvAniti# prajA - vAn|dIrGaḥ|rayiḥ|pRuthubuddhna iti# pRuthu - buddhnaḥ|saBAvAniti# saBA - vAn||Eti|pyAyasva|samiti̍|tE||iha|tvaṣṭA̍ram|agriyam|viśvarU̍pamiti̍# viśva - rUpam|upEti|hvayE||asmAka̱m|astu|kEva̍laḥ||tat|naḥ|turIpa̱m|adha̍|pOṣayitnu|dEva̍|tvaṣṭaḥ|vIti̍|rarAṇaḥ|syasva||yata̍ḥ|vIraḥ|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agninA# rayimaśnavat̍ pOṣamEva̍ divEdivE|yaśasa̍M̍ ~MvIravattamaM||gOmAṃ̍# agnE&vimAṃ̍ aśvI yajñO nRuvathsaKA̍ sadamidapramRuṣyaḥ|iḍA̍vAṃ̍ EṣO asura̍ prajAvA̱n dIrGO rayiḥ pRuthubudhnaḥ̍ saBAvAn||ApyA̍yasva>1,̍ santE̱>2||iha tvaṣṭAramagriyaM̍ ~MviśvarUpamupa̍# hvayE|asmAkamastu̍ kEvalaḥ||tanna̍sturIpamadha̍# pOṣayitnu dEva# tvaṣṭarvi rarAṇaḥ̍ syasva|yatO̍# vIraḥ - [ ] 35

verses.padam: (Padam) karmaṇyaḥ|sudakṣa̍ iti# su - dakṣaḥ|yuktagrAvEti̍# yukta - grAvA|jAyatE|dEvakA̍ma̍ iti# dEva - kAmaḥ||śivaḥ|tvaṣṭaḥ|iha|Eti|gahi|viBuriti̍# vi - Buḥ|pOṣE̱|uta|tmanA̱||yajñE yajña̍ iti# yajñE - yajñE|naḥ|uditi|ava||piśa~gga̍rUpa̍ iti# piśa~gga-rUpaḥ|suBara̍ iti# su - Baraḥ|vayOdhA̍ iti# vayaḥ - dhAḥ|śruṣṭI|vIraḥ|jAyatE|dEvakAma̍ iti# dEva - kAmaḥ||prajAmiti# pra - jAm|tvaṣṭA̱|vIti|syatu|nABi̱m|asmE̍ iti|atha̍|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|Etu|pAtha̍ḥ||prEti̍|naḥ|dEvI|Eti̍|naḥ|divaḥ||pIpivAṃsa̱m|sara̍svataḥ|stana̱m|yaḥ|viśvada̍ṛśata̍ iti# viśva - darq.śataḥ||dhukṣImahi|prajAmiti̍# pra - jAm|iṣa̱m||36 (50)
verses.samhita: karmaṇya̍ḥ̍ sudakṣO# yuktagrAvA̍ jAyatE̍ dEvakAmaḥ||śivastva̍ṣṭarihA&&*̍ gahi̍ viBuḥ pOṣa# utatmanA̱|yajñEyajñE̍ na udava||piśa~gga̍rUpaḥ̍ suBarO# vayOdhAḥ śruṣṭI vIrO jAyatE̍ dEvakAmaḥ|prajAM̍ tvaṣṭA viṣyatu̍ nABimasmE̍ athA# dEvAnAmapyEtu̍ pAthaḥ||praṇO̍dE>3̍ vyA, nO# divaḥ >4||pIpivAṃ saṃq sarasvataḥ̍ stanaM ~MyO viśvadaṛśataḥ|dhukṣImahi̍# prajAmiṣa̱M||36

verses.padam: (Padam) yE|tE|sarasvaḥ|Urmayaḥ|madhu̍manta̍ iti madhu# - mantaḥ|GRutaścuta iti# GRuta - ścutaḥ||tEṣA̱m|tE|sumnam|ImahE||yasya̍|vratam|paśava̍ḥ|yanti̍|sarvE̱|yasya̍|vratam|upatiṣṭha̍nta̍ ityupa̍ -tiṣṭhantE|Apa̍ḥ||yasya̍|vratE|puṣṭipatiriti̍# puṣṭi-patiḥ|nivi̍ṣṭa̍ iti ni - viṣṭaḥ|tam|sarasvantam|ava̍sE|havEma||divyam|suparṇamiti̍# su - parṇam|vayasam|bRuhanta̱m|apAm|garBa̱m|vRuṣaBam|OṣadhInAm||aBIpataḥ|vRuṣṭyA|tarpaya̍ntam|tam|sara̍svantam|ava̍sE|huvEma||sinI̍vAli|pRuthu̍ṣṭuka̍ iti pRuthu# - stukE|yA|dEvAnA̱m|asi|svasA̱||juṣasva̍|havyam|37̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yE tE# sarasva UrmayO madhumantO̍ GRutaścutaḥ|tEṣA̱M̍ tE sumnamImahE||yasya̍# vrataM paśavO yanti sarvE yasya# vratamupatiṣṭha̍nta̍ Apaḥ|yasya̍# vratE puṣṭipatirnivi̍ṣṭastaṃ̍ sarasvantamava̍sE̍ huvEma||divyaṃ suparṇaM̍ ~MvayasaM̍ bRuhantamapAM̍ garBaM̍ ~MvRuṣaBamOṣadhInAM|aBIpatO̍ vRuṣṭyA tarpayantaM̍ taṃ sarasvantamava̍sE̍ huvEma||sinIvAli̍ pRuthuṣṭukE̍ yA dEvAnAmasi svasA̱|juṣasva# havya - [ ] 37

verses.padam: (Padam) AhutamityA̍ - hutam|prajAmiti# pra-jAm|dEvi|didiḍḍhi|naḥ||yA|supAṇiriti# su - pAṇiḥ|sva~gguririti# su - a~gguriḥ|suṣUmEti# su - sUmA̱|bahusUvarIti# bahu - sUvarI||tasyai̱|viśpatni̍yai|haviḥ|sinIvAlyai|juhOtana||indra̱m|vaḥ|viśvata̍ḥ|parIti̍|indra̱m|nara̍ḥ||asi̍tavarṇA̍ ityasita̍ - varṇAḥ|harayaḥ|suparṇA̍ iti# su - parṇAḥ|mihaḥ|vasA̍nAḥ|diva̱m|uditi̍|patanti||tE|Eti̍|avavRutrann|sada̍nAni|kRutvA|At|it|pRuthivI|GRutaiḥ|vIti̍|udyatE||hira̍ṇyakEśa̍ iti hiraṇya̍ - kEśaḥ|rajasaḥ|visAra̍ iti# vi - sArE|ahiḥ|dhuni̍ḥ|vAta̍ḥ|iva|dhrajI̍mAn||śuci̍BrAjA̍ iti śuci# - BrAjAḥ|uṣasaḥ|38̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAhutaM̍ prajAM dEvi̍ didiḍḍhi naḥ||yA supAṇiḥ̍ sva~gguriḥ̍ suṣUmA# bahusUvarI|tasyai̍# viśpatniyai̍ haviḥ sinIvAlyai̍ juhOtana||indra̍M̍ ~MvO viśvatasparI>5, ndraM naraḥ>6||asi̍tavarṇA̍ harayaḥ̍ suparṇA mihO vasAnA̍ divamut patanti||ta̍ A&vavRutranth̍ sadanAni̍ kRutvA&&dit pRuthivI̍ GRutairvyudyatE||hira̍ṇyakEśO̍ rajasO̍ visArE&hirdhunirvAta# iva dhrajImAn|śuci̍BrAjA̍ uṣasO - [ ] 38

verses.padam: (Padam) navEdAḥ|yaśa̍svatIḥ|apasyuva̍ḥ|na|satyAḥ||Eti̍|tE|suparṇA̍ iti# su - parṇAḥ|aminanta|Evai̱ḥ|kRuṣṇaḥ|nOnAva|vRuṣaBaḥ|yadi|idam||śivABi̍ḥ|na|smaya̍mAnABiḥ|Eti̍|agAt|pata̍nti|miha̍ḥ|stanaya̍nti|aBrA||vAśrA|iva|vidyuditi̍# vi-dyut|mimAti|vathsam|na|mAtA|siṣakti||yat|EṣAm|vRuṣṭiḥ|asarji||parva̍taḥ|cit|mahi̍|vRuddhaḥ|biBAya|divaḥ|cit|sAnu̍|rEjata|svanE|vaḥ||yat|krIḍa̍tha|marutaḥ|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: navEdA̍ yaśasvatIrapasyuvO̍ na satyAḥ||A tE# suparṇA aminanta̍ Evai̱ḥ kRuṣṇO nOnAva̍ vRuṣaBO yadIdaM|śivABirna smayamAnABirA&gAt̍ patanti̍ mihaḥ̍ stanayantyaBrA||vAśrEva̍# vidyunmimAti̍ vathsaM na mAtA siṣakti|yadE̍ṣAM̍ ~MvRuṣṭirasarji||parva̍taścinmahi̍# vRuddhO biBAya̍ divaścith sAnu# rEjata svanE vaḥ|yat̍ krIḍatha̍ maruta - [ ] 39

verses.padam: (Padam) Ruṣṭimanta ityRuṣṭi-manta̍ḥ|Apa̍ḥ|iva|saddhriya̍~jcaḥ|dhavaddhvE||aBIti̍|kranda|stanaya̍|garBa̱m|Eti̍|dhAḥ|udanvatEtyu̍dann̍ - vatA̱|parIti|dIya|rathE̍na||dRuti̱m|sviti̍|kaṛqṣa|viṣi̍tamiti̍ vi - sitam|nya~jcam|samAḥ|Bavantu|udvatEtya̍t̍ - vatA̱|nipAdA iti# ni - pAdAḥ||tvam|tyA|cit|acyutA|agnE̱|paśuḥ|na|yava̍sE||dhAma̍|ha|yat|tE|ajara|vanA̱|vRuścanti̍|śikva̍saḥ||agnE̱|BUrI̍ṇi|tava̍|jAtavEda̍ iti# jAta - vEdaḥ|dEva|svadhAva̍ iti# svadhA - vaḥ|amRutasya|dhAma̍||yAḥ|ca|40̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Ruṣṭimanta Apa# iva saddhriya~jcO̍ dhavaddhvE||aBi kranda̍ stanaya garBamA dhA# udanvatA pari# dIyA rathEna|dRutiṃq̍ su kaṛṣa̍ viṣitaM̍ nya~jcaṃ̍ samA BavantUdvatA̍# nipAdAḥ||tvaM tyA cidacyutA&gnE# paśurna yavasE|dhAmA̍# ha yat tE# ajara vanA# vRuścanti śikvasaḥ||agnE̍ BUrIṇi̍ tava# jAtavEdO dEva# svadhAvO&mRutasya̍ dhAma|yAśca̍# - [ ] 40

verses.padam: (Padam) mAyAḥ|mAyinA̱m|viśvaminvEti# viśvam-inva|tvE iti|pUrvIḥ|sandadhuriti̍# saM - dadhuḥ|pRuṣṭabandhO iti# pRuṣṭa - bandhO||divaḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭim|marutaḥ|rarIddhvam|prEti|pinvata|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|aśva̍sya|dhArA̱ḥ||arvA~g|EtEna̍|stanayitnunA̱|Eti̍|ihi|apaḥ|niṣi~jcanniti̍# ni -si~jcann|asuraḥ|pitA|naḥ||pinva̍nti|apaḥ|maruta̍ḥ|sudAna̍va̍ iti# su - dAnavaḥ|paya̍ḥ|GRutavaditi̍# GRuta - vat|vidathEṣu|ABuva̍ ityA̱ - Buvaḥ||atya̱m|na|mihE|vIti̍|nayanti|vAjina̱m|uthsa̱m|duhanti|stanaya̍ntam|akṣi̍tam||udapruta̍ ityuda̍ - prutaḥ|marutaḥ|tAn|iyarta|vRuṣṭi̱m|41̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mAyA mAyinA̱M ~Mviśvaminva tvE pUrvIḥ sandadhuḥ̍ pRuṣṭabandhO||divO̍ nO# vRuṣṭiM marutO̍ rarIddhvaM prapinvata̍ vRuṣṇO aśvasya̍ dhArA̱ḥ|arvA~gEtEna# stanayitnunEhyapO niṣi~jcannasu̍raḥ̍ pitA naḥ||pinva̍ntyapO̍ marutaḥ̍ sudAnavaḥ̍ payO# GRutavadvidathE̱ṣvA̍ Buvaḥ|atyaM̍ na mihE vi nayanti̍ vAjinamuthsaM̍ duhanti stanayantamakṣi̍taM||udaprutO̍# marutastAṃ iyarta̍ vRuṣṭiM - [ ] 41

verses.padam: (Padam) yE|viśvE̱|marutaḥ|junanti̍||krOśA̍ti|gardA̱|kanyA̱|iva|tunnA|pEru̱m|tu~jjAnA|patyA̱|iva|jAyA||GRutEna̍|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|madhunA|samiti̍|ukṣata|paya̍svatIḥ|kRuṇuta|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhIḥ||Urja̱m|ca|tatra̍|sumatimiti̍# su - matim|ca|pinvatha|yatra|naraḥ|marutaḥ|si~jcatha̍|madhu̍||uditi̍|u|tyam|citram||aurvaBRuguvadityau̱vaBRugu̍ - vat|śuci̱m|apnavAnavadityapnavAna̍ - vat|Eti|huvE||agnim|samudravA̍sasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||Eti|savam|savituḥ|yathA|Baga̍sya̍ ( )|iva|Bujim|huvE||agnim|samudravAsasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||huvE|vAtasvanamiti̍ vAta# - svanam|kavim|parjanyakrandyamiti̍# parjanya# - krandyam|sahaḥ||agnim|samudravA̍sasamiti̍# samudra - vAsasam||42 (62) (vIra - iṣaṃ# - havya - muṣasO# - maruta - śca - vRuṣṭiM - Bagasya̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ca) (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (prajApatirakAmayatai̍ - ṣa tE# gAyatrO - yajñaM ~Mvai - prajApatErjAya̍mAnAḥ̍ - prAjApatyA - yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - miṣṭargO# - nigrAByA̱ḥ stha - yO vai dEvA - ~jjuṣṭO - &gninA# rayi - mEkAdaśa̍ ) Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (prajApatirakAmayata̍ - prajApatErjAya̍mAnA̍ - vyAyacCantE̍ - mahyamimA̍ - nmAyA mAyinAn - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ First and Last Padam of First Prasnam Of Kandam 3:- (prajApatirakAmayatA̍ -&gniṃ samudravA̍sasaM̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE pada pAṭhE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||=================================
verses.samhita: ~MyE viśvE# marutO# junanti|krOśA̍ti̍ gardA# kanyEva̍ tunnA pEruM̍ tu~jjAnA patyEva̍ jAyA||GRutEna dyAvApRuthivI̍ madhunA̍ samukṣata̍ payasvatIḥ̍ kRuṇatA&&*pa OṣadhIḥ|Urja̍M̍ ca tatra# sumatiM ca# pinvatha yatrA# narO marutaḥ si~jcathA madhu||udutyaM̍ >7, citraM >8||aurva-BRuguvacCucimapnavAnavadA̍ huvE|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||A̍ savaṃ saviturya̍thA̍ BagasyE̍ ( ) va Bujiṃ huvE|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||huvE̍ vAtasvanaM̍ kaviM parjanyakrandyaṃq̍ sahaḥ|agniṃ̍ samudravA̍sasaM||42̍ (vIra - iṣaṃ# - havya - muṣasO# - maruta - śca - vRuṣṭiM - Bagasya̍ - dvAdaśa̍ ca) (A11) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (prajApatirakAmayatai̍ - ṣa tE# gAyatrO - yajñaM ~Mvai - prajApatErjAya̍mAnAḥ̍ - prAjApatyA - yO vA ayathAdEvata̍ - miṣṭargO# - nigrAByA̱ḥ stha - yO vai dEvA - ~jjuṣṭO - &gninA# rayi - mEkAdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (prajApatirakAmayata̍ - prajApatErjAya̍mAnA̍ - vyAyacCantE̍ - mahyamimA̍ - nmAyA mAyinAn - dvicatvAriṃśat)̍ first and last padam of first praśnam of kAṇḍam 3:- (prajApatirakAmayatA̍ -&gniṃ samudravA̍sasaM̍ )||hariḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM tRutIyakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||3.1.1 appendix 1. 3.1.11.1 - A pyAyasva̍ >1 ApyAsva̍ samEtu̍ tE viśvataḥ̍ sOma vRuṣṇiyaM|BavA̍ vAjasya̍ saMgathE||(Appearing in ṭś 4-2-7-4) 2. 3.1.11.1 - santE# >2 saM tE payAṃsi̍ samu# yantu vAjAḥ saM ~MvRuṣṇiyAn.̍ yaBimAtiṣAhaḥ|ApyAya̍mAnO̍ amRutAya̍ sOma divi śravAṅsyuttamAni̍# dhiṣva||(Appearing in ṭś 4-2-7-4) 3 & 4. 3.1.11.2 - praṇO# dEvyA>3, nO# divaḥ>4 praṇO# dEvI sarasvatI̍ vAjEBirvAjinI̍vatI|dhInAma̍vitrya̍vatu||A̍ nO# divO bRuhataḥ̍ parvatAdA̍ sarasvatI̍ yajatA gantu̍ yajñaM|havaM̍ dEvI jujuṣAṇA̍ GRutAcI# śagmAM nO vAcamuśatI̍ śRuṇOtu|̍
